title: Absolute Value
text: We do not really have to care about absolute value and it won't affect our calculation for this problem.

title: Left Horizontal Shift
text: What number do we have to add to $$x$$ to perform a left horizontal shift of 1?

title: Right Horizontal Shift
text: Continuing on, what number do we have to substract from the previous answer to perform a vertical shift down by 3?
